title: Breath of Winter
contents: text | All creatures within a 60-foot cone must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 8d8 cold damage, half as much on a successful save.
text | A creature killed by this effect becomes a frozen statue until it thaws.

title: Clench of the North Wind
contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute
text | The target of this effect must make a Wisdom saving throw or be paralyzed. A creature affected by this may make a Wisdom saving throw each turn to end this effect early.
